subject: Sumo Wrestling News Update
intro: Here are the latest updates from the world of sumo wrestling!

articles.title: Onosato Promoted to Yokozuna After Historic Tournament Victory
articles.content:
Onosato from Nishonoseki stable has been promoted to yokozuna 
                     following his dominant performance in the September 2025 basho in Tokyo. 
                     The 25-year-old wrestler achieved a perfect 15-0 record, defeating 
                     ozeki Terunofuji in the final match. This promotion makes him the 
                     75th yokozuna in sumo history. The Japan Sumo Association announced 
                     the promotion during a ceremony at the Kokugikan.
articles.raw_text: Onosato Promoted to Yokozuna After Historic Tournament Victory
articles.summary: 🎉 Onosato of Nishonoseki stable clinches yokozuna title after epic 15-0 win in Tokyo basho! 🏆💪 At just 25, he's the 75th yokozuna in sumo history. 🇯🇵🤼 #Sumo #Yokozuna #Onosato #TokyoBasho #HistoryMade 🥇👑 Check out the full story here: https://

articles.title: Pre-Tournament Interview
articles.content: Japanese sitemap home>　Matches & Topics　>Topics>　Pre-Tournament Interviews　>　2025September 2025 September Grand Sumo Tournament  I am Ajigawa Stable's Aonishiki, newly promoted to Sanyaku.I will strive to achieve double-digit wins this tournament, so I ask for your continued support. See Video Click the left icon to start the video clip.  This is Oitekaze Stable's Hitoshi, the newly promoted Maegashira.I will do my utmost to complete all 15 days injury-free, while showing my best Sumo. Please cheer for me. See Video Click the left icon to start the video clip. articles.title: Onosato Promoted As The 75th Yokozuna In History
articles.content: Japanese sitemap home>Kyokai Information>　Information The Nihon Sumo Kyokai is proud to announce that on May 28, 2025, following a special board of directors meeting, Ozeki Onosato (Nishonoseki Stable) was promoted to the rank of Yokozuna.He now becomes the 75th yokozuna in history. articles.title: Hoshoryu Promoted As The 74th Yokozuna In History
articles.content: Japanese sitemap home>Kyokai Information>　Information The Nihon Sumo Kyokai is proud to announce that on January 29, 2025, following a special board of directors meeting, Ozeki Hoshoryu (Tatsunami Stable) was promoted to the rank of Yokozuna. He now becomes the 74th yokozuna in history.
